extendedInfo.description: Did your five-year-old beat you at chess recently? Do you you keep losing your queen in three turns? Are you looking to improve your chess play regardless of your win percentage? This e-book jumps to the core of chess strategy by focussing on concepts like mobility, the center of the board, weak and strong squares, and pawn structure. Included are numerous diagrams illustrating major chess strategy. Start working your way to being a chess master.

reviews.title: Reader is terrible
reviews.comment: Force closes on HTC sensation. Reader doesn\'t adjust text when you zoom in which makes reading a pain.
reviews.author: A Google User
